description: Reach sinuosity (reach length along the thalweg divided by straight line distance between the bottom of the reach and the top of the reach, expressed as a ratio)
Average bankfull width-depth ratio for the reach where depth is measured from the streambed.
Average bankfull height measured from the streambed across transects (unit: meters).
Average bankfull width across transects for the reach (unit: meters).
Mean slope of water surface from the bottom of the reach to the top of the reach (expressed as percent, unit: none, min: 0, max: 100).
Mean deepest location in the reach (unit: meters).
Length of the sampling reach measured along the thalweg (unit: meters).
Average wetted width across 11 to 21 transects (unit: meters).
Percent of the sample reach (linear extent) classified as pool habitat (expressed as a percent, unit: none, min: 0, max: 100).
Average of the residual pool depth values. Residual pool depth is the difference between the pool tail depth and the max depth (unit: meters).

Average angle of the stream bank within the reach measured where bed-meets-bank to the first flat depositional feature at or above bankfull. Acute angles indicate undercut banks while obtuse angles are laid back banks.
Bed surface particle size corresponding to the 16th percentile of measured particles (unit: millimeters, min: 0, max: 4098).
Bed surface particle size corresponding to the 50th percentile of measured particles (unit: millimeters, min: 0, max: 4098).
Bed surface particle size corresponding to the 84th percentile of measured particles (unit: millimeters, min: 0, max: 4098).
Percent of the stream bed area that is composed of particles with a b axis greater than 4098 millimeters (expressed as percent, units: none, min: 0, max: 100).
Percent of the stream bed area that is comprised of particles with a b axis less than 2 millimeters (expressed as percent, units: none, min: 0, max: 100).
Percent of the stream bed area that is composed of particles with a b-axis less than 6 millimeters (expressed as percent, units: none, min: 0, max: 100).
Average percent fine sediment (less than 2 millimeters) on the pool tail (expressed as percent, unit: none, min: 0, max: 100).
Average percent fine sediment (less than 6 millimeters) on the pool tail (expressed as a percent, unit: none, min: 0, max: 100).
Measured pH value (unit: none, min: 0, max:14).
Measured specific conductance value. The specific conductance is conductivity standardized to 25 degrees C (unit: uS/cm or microSiemens per centimeter).
Measured total nitrogen value (unit: ug/L or micrograms per liter).
Measured total phosphorous value (unit: ug/L or micrograms per liter).
Average water clarity as measured by the suspended solids in the water column (unit: NTU or Nephelometric Turbidity unit)
Total reach length intended to be sampled. Calculated from average widths using the protocol rules (unit: meter).
Number of pools within the sampled reach standardized to pools per kilometer (unit: pools per kilometer).
